title: One Upset, One Blowout In College Football Playoffs
teaser: Underdog Oregon beat Florida State at the Rose Bowl. Oregon will face the Ohio State Buckeyes on Jan. 12.
contentencoded:
It’s going to be “Bucks” versus “Ducks” in college football’s first national championship.

The Ohio State Buckeyes and the Oregon Ducks will meet on January 12 — a match up decided after Ohio State rallied to beat Alabama last night.

Earlier, underdog Oregon knocked Florida State out of the playoffs. Doug Tribou of NPR’s Only A Game joins Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd to tells us how it happened.

Guest

  • Doug Tribou, producer for NPR’s Only A Game. He tweetsÂ @DougTribou.
